data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module provides an extension to Term::Screen. It provides a
    readline() function, which behaves in the Term::Screen environment.
    It can validate it's input according to a regex, and it can do
    uppercase/lowercase conversion.

    Also, there's a new getch() function that can use only one Esc in
    stead of the double Esc key(see Term::Screen documentation).
